name: time of the zombies
description: time of the zombies sets you as the only survivor in an apocalyptic world filled with zombies, guns and ammo. How long will you stay alive? will you end up as zombie food?
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: 2047 mb at least Storage: 1433 MB available space Sound Card: 1gz
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16000 MB RAM Graphics: 8191 mb at least Storage: 2000 MB available space
